issue.title: [Java] Add API to avro adapter to limit number of rows returned at a time.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We can either let clients iterate or ideally provide an iterator interface.  This is important for large avro data and was also discussed as something readers/adapters should haven.
